page.title: 07Public Transport
page.content: {Lincolnshire Road Car}operate 12 buses daily between Scunthorpe,Gainsborough and Lincoln.All pass through Scotter and some through Scotton.No buses on Sunday.{Single fare}is Â£1.35 from Scotter to Gainsborough,to Scunthorpe it is Â£0.90.{Day return}to Lincoln is Â£2.25.The public can use a{private bus {service}which runs 4 times a day between Gainsborough and Scunthorpe. This runs mainly for{British Steel} workers.There is a Sunday service. {National Express}run a daily service to{Birmingham}where connections can be made to many parts of the country. A survey revealed that the car was usually used when travelling to nearby towns.Bus services are considered too infrequent and journeys too long. {British Rail}at Scunthorpe and Gainsborough run services to Doncaster and Retford for{Intercity}connections.
